        Parameters:
        id - tag's ID
        style - tag's style parameter
        x1 - Gradient's line X1 coordinate
        y1 - Gradient's line Y1 coordinate
        x2 - Gradient's line X2 coordinate
        y2 - Gradient's line Y2 coordinate
        stop1_color - Gradient's first stop color
        stop2_color - Gradient's second stop color
        transform - gradient's transformation
        opacity - gradient's opacity
        display - tag's display parameter
